ApexPage.description: Visualforce page for the Relevant Content package which provides a list of content relative to keywords in a record. This page can be used as a standalone in the Salesforce Console for any object. A copy should be made with standardcontroller="OBJECT_API" defined in the <apex:page> definition for use in a page layout for Salesforce1 and/or the standard (Aloha) UI
ApexPage.label: RC_RelevantContentConsole
